Guide

Ghost Protocol — User Guide

A 5-minute walkthrough of setup, workflows, and best practices so you can win your next negotiation.

Visit the app

  • Landing: https://ghost-green.vercel.app
  • App: https://ghost-green.vercel.app/app

Sign in

  • Start as Guest instantly
  • Link Google or Email to persist sessions and unlock upgrades

Run a session

  • Pick a mode (Sales, Interview, Dating)
  • Click START
  • Keep Ghost visible (desktop HUD or mobile bottom sheet)
  • Mention price / budget / competition / timeline to trigger cues

Review afterwards

  • Open Session Replay for transcripts, cues, analytics
  • Export CSV/PDF if plan allows

Dashboard Overview

Floating HUD

Live intel, focus mode, pinning, whisper control, hotkeys

Live Intel Board

Full list of cues with KB badge when RAG context is used

Live Transcript

Scrollable log of You vs Them speech

Quick Actions (mobile)

Bottom sheet with latest cue + Focus / Whisper toggles

Analytics

Usage stats, cue generation, feature usage (Founders+)

Key Workflows

Running a Session

  1. Select a mode in the top bar
  2. Adjust parameters if needed
  3. Start the session (hotkey Ctrl+Shift+S)
  4. Mention key triggers to surface cues
  5. Use hotkeys to toggle focus, mute whispers, pin HUD

Knowledge Base (RAG)

  1. Open Knowledge Base modal
  2. Upload text / markdown files (PDF support coming soon)
  3. Ghost chunk + embed + push to Pinecone
  4. KB-sourced cues show a green “KB” badge

Custom Playbooks

  1. Create playbook with scenario + instruction prompt
  2. Add example cues for reference
  3. Select playbook to activate (persists per user)
  4. All coaching cues now follow that persona

Session Replay & Export

  1. Open Session Replay modal
  2. Browse sessions (limited by plan)
  3. Review transcripts, cues, analytics
  4. Export CSV/PDF if entitlement allows

Hotkeys

  • Toggle HUDCtrl + Shift + G
  • Pin / Unpin HUDCtrl + Shift + H
  • Next cueCtrl + Shift + I
  • Open intel boardCtrl + Shift + L
  • Focus ModeCtrl + Shift + F
  • Mute whispersCtrl + Shift + M
  • Start / Stop sessionCtrl + Shift + S

Plans & Entitlements

Free

Testing

$0

KB: 3 docs

Replay: 5 sessions

Analytics: Basic

Pros

$99/mo

KB: 10 docs

Replay: 50 sessions

Analytics: Full

Founders

Lifetime

$299 once

KB: 20 docs

Replay: Unlimited

Analytics: Full

Enterprise

Teams

Custom

KB: Unlimited

Replay: Unlimited

Analytics: Full + API/SAML

Best Practices

  • •Use Focus Mode during objection-heavy moments
  • •Upload fresh KB docs (battle cards, pricing) before calls
  • •Monitor analytics after each session for cue patterns
  • •Record your “Inception Method” video for social proof
  • •Pair Ghost with headphones for whisper coaching
  • •Experiment with Playbooks for each persona / vertical
